definition: to transliterate/to transcribe/to transfer words onto a surface by direct contact (as with a decal)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Every telephone conversation will be recorded and transcribed.
sentences.chinese: 所有電話交談都將被錄音並作全文轉寫。

sentences.english: The colorful patterns on these glasses and pots were applied by silk screening.
sentences.chinese: 彩色鍋和玻璃杯的絹印圖案，多由轉寫紙轉印而成。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
phonetic component of a Chinese character
radical of a compound word (in European language)
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
